short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save the current page: pick a bookmark folder from a searchable list

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Each bookmark folder is presented with its full path in an ordered, searchable list. You can easily...

路 Find the folder you want
路 Create a new subfolder if necessary
路 Bookmark the current page in that folder
路 Edit the bookmark's title and address


Open the Popup: Alt+B
Choose another shortcut: chrome://extensions/shortcuts
